testCase.name: MainDashboard2Component should create
MainDashboard2Component should initialize with correct title
MainDashboard2Component should initialize collapsed signal as false
MainDashboard2Component should initialize currentLanguage signal as English
MainDashboard2Component should initialize darkModeValue signal from DarkModeService
MainDashboard2Component should add languages in constructor
MainDashboard2Component should initialize with default language from localStorage (en)
MainDashboard2Component should change language to French
MainDashboard2Component should change language to English
MainDashboard2Component should return correct theme aria label
MainDashboard2Component should return correct color theme aria label
MainDashboard2Component should toggle fullscreen when not in fullscreen
MainDashboard2Component should exit fullscreen when in fullscreen
MainDashboard2Component should handle fullscreen error
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavWidth for mobile
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavWidth for non-mobile collapsed
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavWidth for non-mobile non-collapsed
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavMode for mobile
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavMode for non-mobile
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavOpened for mobile and collapsed
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavOpened for mobile and non-collapsed
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavOpened for non-mobile
MainDashboard2Component should toggle sidenav collapsed state
MainDashboard2Component should toggle sidenav when clicking the menu button
MainDashboard2Component should close sidenav on mobile when clicking content area
MainDashboard2Component should not close sidenav on non-mobile when clicking content area
MainDashboard2Component should open mobile menu when clicking mobile menu button
MainDashboard2Component should toggle dark mode via button toggle group
MainDashboard2Component should select dark theme from dark mode menu
MainDashboard2Component should select color theme from color theme menu
MainDashboard2Component should toggle fullscreen from mobile menu
MainDashboard2Component should select light mode from mobile menu
MainDashboard2Component should select dark mode from mobile menu
MainDashboard2Component should open theme menu from mobile menu
MainDashboard2Component should open color theme menu from mobile menu
MainDashboard2Component should open language menu from mobile menu
MainDashboard2Component should handle invalid auth data in localStorage
